channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Omega owner Swatch Group’s moment has passed as profits drop 70% in 6 months: ‘The big impact is really mainly China’
item.description: The company’s key Omega brand may be suffering from more availability of models at retail from rival Rolex, the top Swiss watch brand.

item.title: Monday's analyst calls: Apple upgraded on AI push, Nvidia price target increased
item.description: Updated live blog of the biggest analyst calls out on Monday morning, including ones on Apple and Nvidia.

item.title: U.K. house price drop bigger-than-forecast 0.4% in July, says Rightmove
Qualcomm sues China’s Transsion, the ‘Smartphone King of Africa,’ for infringing on its patents
item.description: Transsion has almost half of Africa's smartphone market and the company is expanding in South Asia and other emerging markets.

item.title: Trump Media shares surge 55% in premarket trading after assassination attempt
item.description: Trump Media shares surged 50% in premarket trading Monday following the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Swatch reports first-half sales decline amid tough China market
Thailand is trying to create a ‘whirlwind’ in its economy with a $14 billion program that includes handouts to almost anyone over the age of 16
item.description: An estimated 50 million Thais 16 years and older are qualified to receive 10,000 baht ($276) each under the so-called digital wallet scheme.

item.title: Burberry shares drop 15% after the luxury giant issues profit warning and replaces CEO
item.description: Shares in Burberry plunged on Monday morning after a "disappointing" first-quarter performance led it to replace its CEO and axe its dividend.

item.title: Stock market’s long-awaited Great Rotation needs to overcome this nagging worry
‘Football is seldom ever just about sports’—this year’s European Championship demonstrated how waves of immigration have redefined sports
item.description: Young footballers of color such as Nico Williams and Barcelona’s 16-year-old Lamine Yamal still face personal abuse.

item.title: Goldman Sachs is set to report second-quarter earnings — here’s what Wall Street expects
item.description: Expectations have been set high for Goldman Sachs, with Wall Street businesses in the midst of a rebound after a dismal 2023.

item.title: High stakes for investors as Fed tries curing inflation without causing downturn
Texas Gov. Greg Abbott slams power company CenterPoint as 270,000 homes and businesses remain without power after Hurricane Beryl
item.description: “Power companies along the Gulf Coast must be prepared to deal with hurricanes, to state the obvious,” Abbott said at his first news conference about Beryl.

item.title: 'Tragedy for democracy': World leaders condemn assassination attempt on Trump
item.description: World leaders have joined together to condemn the assassination attempt on former U.S. President Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally over the weekend.

item.title: Dow futures edge higher after Trump assassination attempt
